org.jasig.cas.logout

Interface LogoutMessageCreator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SamlCompliantLogoutMessageCreator

    public interface LogoutMessageCreator
    Contract that defines the format of the logout message sent to a client to indicate that an SSO session has terminated.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String create(LogoutRequest request)
      Builds the logout message to be sent.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        String create(LogoutRequest request)
        Builds the logout message to be sent.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        Returns:
        the message. Message may or may not be encoded.
